channel.title: Any coders know the Skill # list?
channel.description:
Hi, I need to know the skill # list. Like, you search for this... [code]if(skillNum == 0) { sendQuest("@gre@"+playerLevel[0]+"@gre@", 4004); sendQuest("@whi@"+getLevelForXP(playerXP[0])+"@whi@", 4005);[/code] Notice the... [code]skillNum == 0)[/code]
Whats each skill's number ordered correctly, please? Help is appreciated. :)

item.title: Any coders know the Skill # list?
item.dc:creator: @Play_N_Skillz Play N Skillz
item.description:
@Play_N_Skillz wrote:

Its alright, anyone else happen to know? I can never get the objects to add the correct Skill xp when using them…[br][size=1]Posted on: May 09, 2007, 04:51:07 PM[/size][hr]Please someone I need to know which Skill # is which badly atm… Sorry for double post.

Read full topic
item.source: Any coders know the Skill # list?
